pages.text: The locals used to call this being '$(#5454fc)Herobrine$()'. Whether or not that's it's true name, it's all we have to go on. It is not hostile, at least for now - just mischievous. You may find it replaces your torches, builds strange structures near you, or just stares from afar.

Sometimes you'll see a regular creature with those glowing white eyes. When this happens, that creature will be $(#00a800)unnaturally strong$(), and you'll need to exercise caution around it. However, it's also the only way you can $(6)get close enough to study$() Herobrine, as in its usual form it'll simply disappear.
I advise against angering it, if you can. Not much else is known about it.
pages.name: Herobrine
